title: i have baccalaureate this year
body: because of my studies i want to get banned for a current period to focus . if its possible give me the steps to get into it.

replies.body: Uninstalling the game seems like a more reasonable alternative.
or using a computer that can't run League

I would submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) regarding that. You can also reach them through [Twitter](https://mobile.twitter.com/RiotSupport?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor). 

They’ll ban your account for you.
Uninstall the game and gain some self control
Given that you could just make another account, the only practicable solution is to exercise your willpower and focus on your studies.

[Quote Shadis from AoT abridged.](https://youtu.be/Asg9ywSfOuE)

Or close your account through support.
